website_summaries.verdict: Popular thyroid supplement with a comprehensive formula of essential minerals, herbs, amino acids, and vitamins. Includes iodine.
pros: Reported increases in energy, brain function, libido, and weight loss
For some longtime thyroid sufferers, this was a game changer
Double the capsule supply for same price as competing brands
cons: For some, no noticeable difference from taking this but took advantage of the 100% money-back guarantee

customer_reviews.title: I've lost 37 lbs it works
customer_reviews.text: I've had thyroid issues all my life I was prescribed something at around 11 but I dont remember what it was called. I'm now 27 and I was looking for something I could purchase without having to go to the doctor I found this and I lost 10 lbs the 1st week with a strict diet of course. Dieting is key for this to work you have to cut back on calorie consumption but trust me it's totally worth it. the energy I have now is incredible I feel alive again I started at 432 now I'm currently at 394 (results are currently 2 months only) if you're reading this you can do it too!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas gaona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: How do I know this works? I have been having regular blood tests for the last few months for other issues. My T3 and T4 are now back in the normal zones. Much thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan N Miller

customer_reviews.title: This could be part of the hypothyroid solution you have been seeking
customer_reviews.text: This mineral supplement was combined with carbonyl iron and it has help significantly. Waking up early instead of having a hard time crawling out of bed late. Most interesting is that after starting this and the iron supplement, the TSH levels dropped, suggesting that it has aided the conversion of T4 to T3. Feeling more alive while decreasing the dosage of levothyroxine! Wouldn't have believed it three months ago. Been struggling for years before this.
customer_reviews.author: KGsomonauk

customer_reviews.title: Purely Holistic Thyroid Support Supplement is just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This supplement gives me more energy, helps with brain fog, and has even helped my eyes. Usually after a day of looking at a computer, my eyes are dry, achey, and almost unable to focus. I've not noticed that problem near as often while taking this great supplement. It makes me feel all-around more "normal"! :) I do plan on ordering again because I don't want to run out!
customer_reviews.author: Pixelrella

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty impressed- this supplement seemed to work better than Levothyroxine to normalize my numbers. Definitely stopped the hair falling out and dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: RDH

customer_reviews.title: This was life changing
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this supplement due to experiencing a variety of hyperthyroid symptoms. I lost quite a bit of hair, my scalp itched constantly (no dandruff or other issues 😉) I had trouble falling asleep, and when I did finally fall asleep, I didn't stay asleep. Joint pain, you name it, I was experiencing it. I didn't want to take a thyroid medication for life. So, I tried Thyroid Support. Within 2 weeks I was sleeping much better. I had no more scalp itching or body twitching at night ( which I also suffered with). Within 2 months, I had hair growth! I will continue taking this forever. And the best part zero side effects 👌
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Been feeling super blah lately and after some bloodwork, found out it’s my thyroid again. I’ve had low energy, brain fog, irritability, dry skin, always cold, and so on. So in addition to getting my meds increased, which my doc has done in the past, I thought I’d give this supplement a shot. It’s only been a few days and I will update my review as time goes on, but I feel like a million bucks! My energy level is through the roof! God, I needed this! I can’t believe how good I feel! 😃
customer_reviews.author: Beth Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff, Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: I had been taking this supplement for a few months and ran out. I was getting good results and didn't want to wait for Amazon to ship another order so I purchased another more expensive brand (only difference was that it did not contain any soy or shellfish). However, the results were exactly the same . . . .more energy, fewer hot flashes and better sleep. Hence, because the Purely Holistic brand was a better value, I have reordered.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy E.

customer_reviews.title: great supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product and do believe that it has helped with my low thyroid (hypothyroid). I also take NP Thyroid (Rx) and have my TSH and T3 and T4 levels tested every 6 months. So far so good and I feel pretty good. I recommend this product to anyone suffering with hypothyroidism, even if you are taking medication.
customer_reviews.author: KGuerra

customer_reviews.title: Like any supplement
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time when ordered. I took it for 2 months and for me I didn't see any changes in my situations to continue. Like any supplement, everyone's body reacts differently. I was hoping for some improvement with my hair, nails and dry skin. I didn't see any changes whats so ever. What I can say is the supplement was easy to take, smell was pleasant, the taste of the capsules and supplement was easy.
customer_reviews.author: PAPhillips

customer_reviews.title: Energy Boost!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a little less than a week and I immediately felt changes to my energy levels. I felt ridiculously sluggish. Waking up from a full 7 to 8 hours of sleep feeling like I needed a nap within the hour. Absolutely worn down. I took this and the very first day my energy levels were boosted. I will return in a month or two to give updates but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Felicity95

customer_reviews.title: THIS REALLY WORKED FOR ME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was having low to no energy, so I googled what could possibly be causing this. I decided to try the Purely Holistic thyroid support supplement to see what would happen. Within a day or two of taking this product, I noticed I didn't need to take my usual afternoon nap. I ran out of it but didn't reorder early enough. My energy level plumetted again. I decided to reorder this supplement again.
customer_reviews.author: ChinaDoll

customer_reviews.title: Great Thyroid Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have hypothyroidism and I started using this supplement a few months ago. I will do about anything to avoid taking prescription medicine. After a few weeks, I noticed that I experienced none of the common hypothyroid symptoms. A couple of weeks ago, I had my annual blood tests. While I did still have elevated TSH, my T4 free level was right in the middle of the appropriate range. I just received my 2nd bottle and I will definitely keep taking this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby A.

customer_reviews.title: Went to the doc, had some bloodwork done and ...
customer_reviews.text: Went to the doc, had some bloodwork done and lithium was making my thyroid a bit off, these gave me the boost I needed to get back to normal. Lessened chin hair, I'm not so sore, feet are less yellow

customer_reviews.title: Change my review after blood work
customer_reviews.text: I just received it so I can not really say. I know that I am not having any adverse side effects from it as I did with the prescription my Dr. gave me. I quit taking that since it mad me feel worse than before I started it. Time will tell. OK since my last review have continued to take the supplement but unfortunately just got my blood work today and my TSH actually increased quite a bit so I have to change my review to :it did not work for me".

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have brought my TSH down with a gluten free diet and this supplement - my symptoms have improved greatly - I won't be without this!!

customer_reviews.text: On my 2nd bottle of Purely Holistic and I must say that it has really helped my sluggish thyroid in feeling better than ever! I feel more energized and have been able to lose weight while on these pills. I feel less achy as is the case with people with hypothyroidism and grave's disease. I highly recommend them to anyone wanting to feel better and lose some unwanted weight!

customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Did have slight headache & nausea for the 1st week but not anymore. I do feel a lil better. Its been a month so far UPDATE: I take one pill in the morning with breakfast & one in the after noon with lunch (instead of taking them together like I use to) I have no nausea & my energy last throughout the day. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Steph Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great support !!
customer_reviews.text: As of this writing I have only taken this thyroid supplement for 6 days. The brain fog is gone & I am sleeping better. I am taking one capsule in the morning but the first day I took one in the morning & one later and felt I needed to start slower because I just felt off.. I feel less fatigued every day. I hope this is the answer for my under active thyroid & the next blood test everything will be normal & no need for prescriptions. I am totally a natural gal & praise God for people that can supply us with supplements that can help.

customer_reviews.title: Answered my prayers!

customer_reviews.text: I attempted to use this product in place of my Levothyroxine. After two months using only the product, my thyroid levels were not quite within the acceptable range. I started back on Levothyroxine and am still using Thyroid Support, simply because I feel better. I have more energy and just feel better overall. I will have my levels checked again in the future to see how they compare with the combination of meds and TS. I will continue to use this product.

customer_reviews.title: Even though I take thyroid prescription medication this seems to help me feel better. It has really helped with my tongue
customer_reviews.text: I really thinks this helps me. Even though I take thyroid prescription medication this seems to help me feel better. It has really helped with my tongue. Due to hypothyroidism, your tongue can get swollen. I use to get sore spots on my tongue from rubbing on my teeth. Since I have been taking this, I have had no more sore spots!

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I started taking thyroid supplements on the advice of my doctor. My thyroid levels had dropped when I changed my diet to mitigate the effects of acid reflux, causing me to feel tired and lethargic. The supplements have helped greatly in restoring my energy and getting thyroid levels back closer to normal. Your product works well and is much cheaper than the one I was buying from the clinic.

customer_reviews.title: Refluxing these up?
customer_reviews.text: For those who experience a burp/ acid reflux with this supplement, it’s likely your own digestive enzymes are depleted. If you take it with an enzyme supplement, you’ll likely have no more issues. This is also an indication you should be taking a digestive enzyme with every meal.
customer_reviews.author: EverydayReader

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many thyroid supplements in the 16 years since I was diagnosed with hypothyroidism. I am on my 3rd month of this supplement and I feel better than I have years. With this supplement, I am in range for where my thyroid should be. I do not take anything else for my thyroid. I would definitely recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. The recommended dosage is 2 tablets, but I take 4. My feet and hands get really cold due to hypothyroid, and 2 tablets don't relieve this pain. So, I take 2 in the morning and 2 at night. Works like a charm.

This supplement is a winner!

She had recommended trying this supplement coupled with a raw thyroid supplement. My thyroid issues are now under control, and the follow up blood work agrees. customer_reviews.title: 4 days, so far, so great.
customer_reviews.text: I am only four days in to taking this supplement; however, I have noticed an immediate increase in energy and stamina. Markedly, I am no longer falling asleep mid-afternoon. I have attributed my general fatigue to aging but started to wonder about my thyroid and thought i would give this a try. I know some may be skeptical of the immediate efficacy and, in all candor, it may very well be a result of the multi vitamins and minerals contained in the supplement or the "placebo" effect. Nevertheless, I am pleased with how I feel and attribute it to this recent addition. I should also note that I have experienced no negative or deleterious effects such as jitteriness or restlessness.

customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on Saturday night and got it Monday morning (which was also a holiday). The customer service was wonderful and have no doubt I will order again from them. Regarding the product I have been taking it a little over a week now and am noticing a difference (though I cant say a huge one). My energy is starting to come back and they bring fog is starting to diminish. Although its only been a week I feel a positive change coming on.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Young

customer_reviews.title: great price great product
customer_reviews.text: After 1 week i could already feel a difference. I was not as cold all the time and I have more energy.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: No change
customer_reviews.text: These pills were purchased to help me lose weight because I got chunky after I had a baby and I got even more so after I did a birth control shot right after I had my baby. Anyway, so far I have exercised I eat as much healthy food as I can get and I have not lost any weight. Instead i have gained weight. The pill itself was good though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thankful
customer_reviews.text: Have used several thyroid medications and supplements. This is by FAR the best. I feel better than I have in years. Thankful to have found Purely Holistic Thyroid Support.

customer_reviews.title: I definitely feel better
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Thyroid support for about a month and a half now and have noticed that my mood has gotten better, my energy has increased and my hair isn't falling out as much. The pills are easy to swallow and caused no stomach upset. As for my thyroid levels, I haven't had any blood work since I started taking this product. I definitely feel better though! In due to have my thyroid checked soon so I'll be able to see how it's affected it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement for thyroid
customer_reviews.text: This supplement seems to be helping - I'll know more at my next blood test and I'll update this post. The only bad thing is that the pill definitely repeats on you, creating throat discomfort - so it must be taken with a meal. I have to take one at lunch and one at dinner to make sure I'm eating enough food to keep the pill down.

customer_reviews.title: It helped.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a natural supplement for my thyroid and so far my skin isn't flaking anymore, my periods have started again and my hair is back to normal.

customer_reviews.text: Since I started taking these Ive noticed that I just feel better all around. I have more energy and don't feel so sluggish anymore. Good product that I recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing. Day . I felt like a new person with a lot of energy. I had been exhausted for weeks, and this was the boost I needed. I have been taking a little over a week.

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: Received product in a timely manner. Too early to say for sure how much this helps but so far so good. What I like about this product Best is that it is botanical; some other thyroid supplements I checked had actual thyroid hormone in them, potentially from pigs, and that scares me. I just wanted plant based support and this product does that.

customer_reviews.title: You will feel you have more Energy
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy how I feel more energized through out the day. In the 1st week of taking this product; my energy has been out the roof. I normally get tired at work around 2pm - 3pm but now after taking Purely Holistic Thyroid Support... I get tired at 6pm - 8pm when it's time to wine down. Thank you Purely Holistic, I will be ordering more of this product.
